title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality. This is a part of the larger story arc.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology. This is a part of the larger story arc.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to save humanity.

title: The Dark Knight
description: A vigilante battles crime in a corrupt city while facing his ultimate nemesis.

title: The Matrix Reloaded
description: Neo continues his fight against the machines and uncovers deeper truths about the Matrix.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: Earth's mightiest heroes assemble for one final battle to undo the damage caused by Thanos.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic Marine on an alien planet becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his new home.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family and infiltrate their household.

title: The Lion King
description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after the death of his father only to learn the true meaning of responsibility.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: A series of interconnected stories involving crime redemption and dark humor.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: An epic journey to destroy a powerful ring that threatens the world.

title: The Social Network
description: The story of the creation of Facebook and the legal battles that followed.

title: Spirited Away
description: A young girl becomes trapped in a mysterious world of spirits and must find her way back to the human world.

title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general fights his way back to honor and vengeance.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: Schindler's List
description: A businessman saves hundreds of Jewish refugees during the Holocaust by employing them in his factories.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The extraordinary life story of a simple man with a big heart who unintentionally influences historical events.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
description: Bruce Wayne returns to face a new adversary and save Gotham City one last time.

title: Dune
description: The son of a noble family becomes embroiled in a war over the galaxy's most valuable resource on a desert planet.

title: The Prestige
description: Two rival magicians engage in an obsessive competition with tragic results.

title: Whiplash
description: A young drummer strives for greatness under the tutelage of a ruthless instructor.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in a post-apocalyptic world in search of her homeland.
Two young British soldiers embark on a dangerous mission to deliver a message that could save thousands of lives.

title: Blade Runner 2049
description: A young blade runner discovers a secret that could unravel society and sets out to find a missing figure from the past.
